function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Wearables accentuating anxiety over sleep habits","Impact":"Increased stress and anxiety","Mitigation":"Provide education and support for interpreting wearable data","Technologies":"Mental health apps, sleep coaching platforms","People":"Users of sleep trackers","Owner":"Healthcare providers, mental health professionals"},{"Description":"Data privacy and security issues","Impact":"Unauthorized access to sensitive personal data","Mitigation":"Implement strong encryption, data anonymization, and user consent protocols","Technologies":"Blockchain, encryption algorithms","People":"Wearable users, consumers","Owner":"Data protection authorities, wearable companies"},{"Description":"Commercial exploitation of personal data","Impact":"Loss of privacy, targeted advertising, and potential exploitation","Mitigation":"Regulate data sharing and usage, provide transparency and user control","Technologies":"Data protection regulations, privacy-preserving technologies","People":"Wearable users, consumers","Owner":"Government regulators, consumer protection agencies"}]}
